headline: Target Leadership Shakeup Restructuring And Protests Test Store Centric Focus
summary: Target announced major executive changes, naming Cara Sylvester as chief merchandising officer and Lisa Roath as chief operating officer, alongside several departures and retirements. The company is restructuring its workforce by cutting around 500 roles in corporate, regional, and supply chain functions to prioritize store staffing and customer experience. Target stores are facing nationwide protests linked to U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement activities in Minnesota, putting a...
